ca.ualberta.lard.test

Class DataModelTests

  • java.lang.Object
      • ca.ualberta.lard.test.DataModelTests

  • public class DataModelTests
extends
    JUnit tests for the Datamodel. Tests handling requests from Comment model and saving locally and to stretchy client.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataModelTests() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void testEmptySearch()
      Tests that the Datamodel can pull at least 1 comment from the server when a request is made for any comments.
      void testGetByIdExists()
      Tests making a request to the Datamodel for an existing comment returns the correct comment and returns only 1 comment.
      void testGetByIdNotExists()
      Tests that trying to make a request to the Datamodel for a non-existent comment returns null.
      void testIsLocal()
      Tests that the Datamodel is able to check if a comment is saved locally.
      void testSave()
      Tests that a comment can successfully be saved to stretchy client.
      void testSearchByBody()
      Tests that the Datamodel can search for a comment using only body text.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataModelTests

        public DataModelTests()

    • Method Detail

      • testSave

        public void testSave()
        Tests that a comment can successfully be saved to stretchy client.

      • testGetByIdExists

        public void testGetByIdExists()
        Tests making a request to the Datamodel for an existing comment returns the correct comment and returns only 1 comment. Currently uses a hard-coded id that we know exists.

      • testGetByIdNotExists

        public void testGetByIdNotExists()
        Tests that trying to make a request to the Datamodel for a non-existent comment returns null.

      • testIsLocal

        public void testIsLocal()
        Tests that the Datamodel is able to check if a comment is saved locally.

      • testEmptySearch

        public void testEmptySearch()
        Tests that the Datamodel can pull at least 1 comment from the server when a request is made for any comments. Precondition: Elastic search has at least one comment.

      • testSearchByBody

        public void testSearchByBody()
        Tests that the Datamodel can search for a comment using only body text.
